eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
  d^N \mbit{\xi} \equiv  d \xi_1 \cdot \cdot \cdot d \xi_N \ , \quad

  (\mbit{\xi}^*  \cdot \mbit{\xi}) \equiv  \sum_{i=1}^N \xi^*_i  \xi_i \ ,
\

\!  + \sum_{n=3}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!} S_0^{(n)}(y - y_0)^n \bigg{\}}  \!  
\bigg] \ ,
